message: Breathing issues require urgent medical attention.
Wounds may require medical examination before treatment.
Cold and cough symptoms are usually mild and self-limiting.
Ensure regular refills for chronic conditions like diabetes.
Fever can usually be managed with rest, fluids, and OTC medicines.
Mild headaches are common and may improve with rest and hydration.
Antibiotics require a valid prescription from a doctor.
Wounds may require medical examination before treatment.
